title: Adobe Photoshop CC 14 Portable
description:
[img]http://cdn.tutsplus.com/psd.tutsplus.com/uploads/2013/05/photoshop_cc_preview.jpg[/img]

Adobe Photoshop CC 14 Portable 

- Doesn't require install. 
- No patch/crack/keygen needed! 
- No changes to your system. 
- Full portability, can be used through USB!


How to install
 Extract to desired location, launch `PhotoshopPortable.exe`. 
Dependencies: Administrative Rights, Visual C++ (integrated). 
Minimal requirements: Windows 7 with Service Pack 1, Windows 8, 32/64. 
Languages: Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, EnglishGB, Finnish, French, 
FrenchCA, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Moroccan, Norwegian, 
Polish, PortugueseBR, Russian, SimpChinese, Spanish, SpanishInternational, Swedish,
 TradChinese, Turkish, Ukrainian.


July 20, 2013 
- Fixed DynamicLink: previously a pop-up appeared at exit warning user it stopped working. 
  (this may still happen but not as frequent, if so, simply close) 
- Removed Fonts to reduce size. 

July 19, 2013 
- Fixed DynamicLink crashing on exit. 
- Fixed DynamicLink hanging after exit. 
- Fixed Visual C++ remaining in System32 and SysWOW64 after exiting. 
  (Visual C++ is only copied into system if it's not present) 
- Combined 32/64 bit. 
- Fixed SymbolicLink's reliability. 
- Added Pre-checks for SymbolicLink: verifies if PortableApps and destination are both compatible. 
- Added additional error-checking per link: each link is independent, and if error occurs, falls back to copying. 
- removed PSD Thumnail support. 
- removed additional shell-support: only PSD filetype is supported natively. 
- removed UPX compression. 
- activated with XFORCE keygen vs. locked trial.
